description: The Choki Choki no Mi is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to transform parts of their body into scissors and cut solid objects as if they were paper, making the user a Scissors Human.

abilities.description: The user can cut and fold solid objects like stone and earth as if they were paper, allowing for creative terrain manipulation.
The user can transform parts of their body, such as hands or fingers, into scissors of varying sizes.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weaknesses (sea water, Seastone)

reveals.information: Choki Choki no Mi allows user to cut and manipulate solid terrain
